channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 由于朝韩关系紧张，延坪岛上的恐惧正在加剧，这里距离朝鲜海岸不到两英里。"人们一直担心朝鲜可能发动袭击"
item.description:
With inter-Korean tensions high, fears are building on Yeonpyeong Island, less than 2 miles from North Korean shores. “There’s constant anxiety about a potential North Korean attack.” https://t.co/1dOHdQMpOV https://t.co/1dOHdQMpOV

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 观看：WSJ 走进首尔郊外的一个地下掩体设施，一旦与金正恩政权开战，美国和韩国的军事行动将集中于此。
item.description:
Watch: WSJ goes inside an underground bunker facility outside of Seoul, where U.S. and South Korean military operations would be centralized in the event of a war with the Kim Jong Un regime. https://t.co/6HsmlBfKdH https://t.co/6HsmlBfKdH

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 他曾是一名律师，生活在美国梦中。后来，精神疾病让他的聪明才智与自己背道而驰。"他的姐姐说："我们以为他会得到他需要的帮助。相反，他失去了一切。
item.description:
He was a lawyer living the American dream. Then mental illness turned his brilliant mind against him. “We thought he was going to get the help he needed,” his sister said. Instead, he lost it all. https://t.co/VPDournp5B https://t.co/VPDournp5B

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 科里纳-尤里斯是一位寡妇，也是七个孩子的祖母，她从平静的学术界生活中抽身出来，挑战委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗。
item.description:
Corina Yoris, a widow and grandmother to seven children, has been plucked out of her quiet life in academia to challenge Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro https://t.co/Ju2xTZYQMO https://t.co/Ju2xTZYQMO

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: "这在曼彻斯特有点不寻常"在马萨诸塞州的海岸边，一栋现代风格的住宅正以 900 万美元的价格在市场上出售。
item.description:
“It’s a little unusual for the Manchester scene.” On the Massachusetts coast, a contemporary home perched high above the water is coming on the market for $9 million. https://t.co/TKs04Qax9X? https://t.co/TKs04Qax9X?

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 莫斯科专制制度的支持者承诺它将提供安全保障。现在，克里姆林宫在国内面临伊斯兰恐怖主义，在国外则要面对一场代价高昂的战争。
item.description:
Supporters of Moscow’s authoritarian system pledged it would provide security. Now the Kremlin faces Islamist terrorism at home and a costly war abroad. https://t.co/xXqbKpfG4U https://t.co/xXqbKpfG4U

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 卡洛斯-塞恩斯（Carlos Sainz）被法拉利车队抛弃，随后被迫接受切除阑尾的紧急手术。他康复后赢得了澳大利亚大奖赛。
item.description:
Carlos Sainz was dumped by his Ferrari team, then forced to undergo emergency surgery to remove his appendix. He recovered to win the Australian Grand Prix. https://t.co/KK8gA9pWqF pic.twitter.com/jsgDPrgDVg

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 最高法院将审理一起可能导致人们无法获得米非司酮堕胎药的案件

item.title: 美国人正在向一款中国应用程序寻求关于发型、妆容和其他造型的残酷而诚实的建议。它不是 TikTok。
item.description:
Americans are turning to a Chinese app for brutally honest advice about their hair, makeup and other looks. And it isn’t TikTok. https://t.co/kx9ICpnswN https://t.co/kx9ICpnswN

item.title: 对于生成式人工智能来说，这是一个令人振奋的时刻。但首席财务官们必须回答一个非常直白的问题：投资回报率是多少？
item.description:
It’s a heady moment for generative AI. But CFOs have to answer a very blunt question: What’s the ROI? https://t.co/LQ01glHpSb https://t.co/LQ01glHpSb

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 维多利亚-贝克汉姆（Victoria Beckham）知道你想谈论那**劳斯莱斯备忘录。以下是事情的经过，以及她日常生活中的更多细节。
item.description:

item.title: 从 8 美元的除臭剂到 46 美元一袋的狗粮，尽管出现了一些经济强劲的迹象，但基本商品价格的飙升仍让收银台前的消费者感到震惊
item.description:
From $8 deodorant to $46 bags of dog food, the jump in price of basic items is still shocking consumers at the register, despite several signs of a strong economy https://t.co/osou7UrrGE https://t.co/osou7UrrGE

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 宅在家里的闺蜜们在 TikTok 上上传了大量关于自我保健、烹饪、清洁的视频，以及对传统婚姻的理想化憧憬--少了结婚戒指
item.description:
Stay-at-home girlfriends have flooded TikTok with videos of self-care, cooking, cleaning and an idealized vision of a traditional marriage—minus the wedding ring https://t.co/pnRAq3R2xY https://t.co/pnRAq3R2xY

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: Discord 平台上的 Z 世代意外地找到了生活在数百或数千英里之外的浪漫伴侣。通过聊天，他们开始互访、见家长，甚至结婚。
item.description:
Gen Z’ers on the platform Discord are unexpectedly finding romantic partners who live hundreds or thousands of miles away. Chats are leading to visits, meeting the parents—even marriage. https://t.co/gJ5cGtV9Ja https://t.co/gJ5cGtV9Ja

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 恭喜你，你刚刚升职了。等等，你还指望着那份新的大工作能给你加薪？
item.description:
Congratulations, you’ve just been promoted. Wait, you were expecting a raise with that big, new job? https://t.co/WNQy6yNBl0 https://t.co/WNQy6yNBl0

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: "Girls5Eva》主演 Busy Philipps 谈及自己小时候的怪癖："我有很强的主见，很容易迷恋自己喜欢的东西，这让其他孩子感到焦虑，他们希望我像他们一样--安静、酷。
item.description:
"Girls5Eva" star Busy Philipps on embracing her weirdness as a kid: "I had strong opinions and easily became obsessed with things I liked, which caused anxiety in other kids who wanted me to be like them—quiet and cool." https://t.co/udizE6HU1g https://t.co/udizE6HU1g

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 拳击手奥斯卡-德拉霍亚（Oscar De La Hoya）在拉斯维加斯再下一城--这一次，他将在拉斯维加斯建造一座豪华住宅，其中包括一个价值 40 万美元的私人洞穴和一个向其职业生涯致敬的房间。
item.description:
Boxer Oscar De La Hoya is going another round with Las Vegas—this time with a tricked out home with features like a $400,000 man cave and a tribute room that pays homage to his career https://t.co/6HmUAOxCCR https://t.co/6HmUAOxCCR

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 深夜节目主持人吉米-法伦（Jimmy Fallon）一直在等待谈论他的护肤程序。"从来没有人问过我，"他说。"我一直在求别人问我"
item.description:
Late-night host Jimmy Fallon has been waiting to talk about his skin care routine. “No one’s ever asked me,” he said. “I’ve been begging for someone to.” https://t.co/3Bg6lVWVkA https://t.co/3Bg6lVWVkA

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 看到朋友离婚或考虑离婚，这位《青年钱报》专栏作家不得不认真思考自己的感情问题
item.description:

item.title: 它看起来就像一个标准的纽约市停车场。但自 2024 年初以来，这座位于曼哈顿西村的建筑已经签订了超过 1 亿美元的交易。
item.description:
It looks like your standard New York City parking garage. But since the beginning of 2024, more than $100 million in deals have been inked at the building in Manhattan's West Village. https://t.co/w1MB8lsXa6 https://t.co/w1MB8lsXa6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 一对空巢老人对另一项建筑工程毫无兴趣。三年后，耗资约 400 万美元，他们将一个原始的阁楼空间改造成了一个引人注目的现代住宅。
item.description:
A pair of empty nesters had no interest in embarking on another construction project. Three years and roughly $4 million later, they turned a raw loft space into a striking modern home. https://t.co/rdhIHdCssR https://t.co/rdhIHdCssR

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 25, 2024

item.title: 马丁-格林菲尔德（Martin Greenfield）于周三去世，他在大屠杀中幸存下来，后来为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）、勒布朗-詹姆斯（LeBron James）和巴拉克-奥巴马（Barack Obama）设计服装。他是美国制造业为何重要的非官方发言人。
item.description:
Martin Greenfield, who died Wednesday, survived the Holocaust and went on to dress Donald Trump, LeBron James and Barack Obama. He was an unofficial spokesman for why American manufacturing matters. https://t.co/mjGsRuRf0O https://t.co/mjGsRuRf0O

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 新泽西州第一夫人塔米-墨菲（Tammy Murphy）暂停竞选陷入困境的民主党人罗伯特-梅嫩德斯（Robert Menendez）的美国参议员席位，后者正面临公共腐败案的审判。
item.description:
New Jersey’s first lady Tammy Murphy suspended her bid for the U.S. Senate seat held by embattled Democrat Robert Menendez, who faces a public-corruption trial https://t.co/fAWz2qPrUk https://t.co/fAWz2qPrUk

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024
